message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, and see how it goes from here!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm hoping you'll come back with a better offer
Thanks for the offer, but I'm hoping for a bit more. I'm not sure I'm ready to give up 30% of the total.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while. 60/40 seems fair, don't you think?
I'm willing to give up more, but I think 75% of the total is a bit too much. Let's try to find a middle ground
Alright, I'll take 75% of the total. I think it's a fair compromise, and I'm willing to call it a day.
